raw_body: Profoundly known as OB Ratnayake. Beloved son of Emil Ratnayake (late) and Gabrielle Ratnayake (late), beloved husband of Astrid Ratnayake (late), loving father of Ruklanthi Ratnayake and Ravi Ratnayake and grandfather of Anishka Weerasinghe, Avinthi Weerasinghe and Taliya Weerasinghe also, brother to Rachelle Ratnayake (late), Kingsley Ratnayake, Kenet Ratnayake (late), Aira Ratnayake (late), Ranji Ratnayake, Anna Ratnayake, Nihal Ratnayake and
